mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_comment (comment, date, post_number, user_number) VALUES (#{comment}, SYSDATE(), #{post_number}, #{user_number})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM post_comment WHERE number = #{commentId} AND (user_number = #{userId} OR post_number IN (SELECT p.number FROM post p WHERE p.number = #{postId} AND p.user_number = #{userId}))
